statements: UPDATE device_log SET event_type = 'Warning' WHERE log_id = 100;
UPDATE device_log SET event_details = 'Device rebooted' WHERE device_id = 200;
UPDATE device_log SET event_type = 'Error', event_details = 'Critical issue detected' WHERE log_id = 100;
UPDATE device_log SET log_timestamp = '2022-05-15 10:30:00', event_type = 'Warning' WHERE device_id = 200 AND log_timestamp > '2022-04-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE DeviceActivity SET activity_type='Maintenance' WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SecurityEvents SET event_description='Unauthorized access detected' WHERE id='654e4567-a89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE security_events SET event_description = 'Unauthorized access attempt' WHERE event_id = 100;

UPDATE SecurityEvents SET severity = 3, event_description = 'Critical Event' WHERE event_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE device_info SET device_location = 'New Location', last_activity_timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE device_id = 456;
